entries.title: CES 2023: LG Breeze earbuds promise to sync you to sleep
entries.description: Using what's described as real-time brain wave sensing technology, LG's Breeze earbuds innovate in search of a better night's sleep.

entries.title: LG debuts its thinnest Gram laptop yet
entries.description: LG's Gram laptops have been among the thinnest and lightest available since their debut. Now, the company is shaving the latest Gram down to its slimmest iteration and launching a new, style-conscious variant, too.

entries.title: CES 2023: OtterBox unveils OtterGrip Symmetry Series iPhone case
entries.description: OtterBox built a collapsible grip directly into its Symmetry Series iPhone case, announced ahead of CES 2023, and it looks pretty darn cool.

entries.title: ZDNET's guide to CES: What is it, when is it, and who can attend?
entries.description: The annual Consumer Electronics Show (CES) is once again playing home to some of the biggest technology product reveals of the brand new year. Let's take a closer look at exactly what the event is, when it's taking place, and who can attend.

entries.title: CES 2023: GE Lighting adds new Cync hexagon panels, bulbs, and customizable neon lights
entries.description: Cync is announcing new smart lighting products ahead of CES 2023, as well as Matter updates and a new Schlage smart lock integration.

entries.title: Nvidia's GeForce Now gaming service is coming to cars to make rides more entertaining
entries.description: At CES 2023, Nvidia announced it will be bringing its gaming services to software defined vehicles.

entries.title: What tech is in the CES 2023 bag of ZDNET's Editor in Chief?
entries.description: What does it take to successfully cover CES 2023? Lots of high-tech gadgets. Here's what our EIC has with him this week during the big show.

entries.title: CES 2023: Movano Health unveils the Evie Ring
entries.description: With its creators seeking FDA approval, the Evie Ring may be the high-quality, compact wearable women have been waiting for.

entries.title: LG announces new C, G, and Z OLED TV lineups at CES 2023
entries.description: Announced during CES 2023, LG's new TV lineup features brighter picture and improved color accuracy.

entries.title: Acer's CES 2023 gaming lineup boasts high-end laptops, big and fast monitors
entries.description: The company brought new entrants to its Nitro and Predator families of gaming laptops and displays to this year's big show, pushing the boundaries of on-the-go gaming and display technology.

entries.title: With Acer's new Bike Desk, you can power your laptop by pedaling
entries.description: At CES 2023, Acer unveiled the eKinekt BD 3, which lets you get a workout and charge your devices all at once.

entries.title: Nvidia's latest Studio Laptop series showcases its fastest, most powerful GPUs
entries.description: At CES 2023, Nvidia announced its newest laptop series that features the biggest generational leap ever seen from previous models.

entries.title: Flipper Zero: Geeky toy or serious security tool?
entries.description: Underneath the Flipper Zero's fun exterior is a dual-core ARM processor that powers hardware that can be used to hack the planet, or so claims the cute virtual dolphin on the sticker that came with it.

entries.title: Samsung's Odyssey G9 gaming monitor family adds OLED, 8K models at CES 2023
entries.description: Samsung's highly successful super-ultrawide Odyssey G9 family is expanding once again with a new OLED model equipped with Quantum Dot technology and what Samsung is calling the "world's first Dual UHD gaming monitor" running at 8K, announced at CES 2023.

entries.title: What is the MacOS Reminders tool and how do you use it?
entries.description: The basic MacOS Reminders app received a fresh update back with Monterey. Now the tool is chock-full of handy features that can help you remember to get things done.

entries.title: How to use MacOS Reminders (and why you should)
entries.description: The basic MacOS Reminders app received a fresh update back with Monterey. Now the tool is chock-full of handy features that can help you remember to get things done.

entries.title: How much did I lose on my 2022 bitcoin investment? It's complicated
entries.description: Last year on New Year's Day, I made an investment in bitcoin with the goal of holding it for a year and reporting back on the results. To say they were unexpected is an understatement.

entries.title: Nvidia's robot simulator now includes human characters too
entries.description: CES 2023: Nvidia unveils improvements to its robotics simulation toolkit - including the ability to test how robots react to humans.

entries.title: Arlo will end support for these older cameras in April. Here's what you need to know
entries.description: Some of Arlo's older devices are reaching end-of-life in April, while some other models will see their end of support next year.

entries.title: CES 2023: Verizon's Gizmo Watch 3 smartwatch for kids can make video calls, launches this week
entries.description: For parents with kids who aren't quite old enough for a phone, the Gizmo Watch 3 adds more features and capabilities.

entries.title: Best Dark Sky alternatives: Check out these two solid iOS weather apps
entries.description: Did you just wave a sad goodbye to Dark Sky? These two apps are worthy alternatives. One might even make you laugh.

entries.title: What's the best alternative to Dark Sky iPhone weather app?
entries.description: Did you just wave a sad goodbye to Dark Sky? Here are two worthy alternatives. One might even make you laugh.

entries.title: Samsung's 5K ViewFinity S9 monitor is a new Apple Studio Display rival
entries.description: Samsung's newest addition to its monitor lineup features a 5K 27" screen for the first time.

entries.title: How to downgrade from Windows 11 to Windows 10
entries.description: If you purchased a PC with Windows 11 preinstalled, you can replace the operating system with Windows 10. But there's a catch.

entries.title: The cost of replacing your iPhone battery is about to go up, and here's why
entries.description: Apple is about to raise prices of battery replacements for some of its devices by between $20 and $50.

entries.title: Samsung now has an oven that can live stream video of your cooking
entries.description: Samsung has bigger screens for your smart fridge and an oven that can tell when your food is getting overcooked.

entries.title: Hacking the metaverse: Why Meta wants you to find the flaws in its newest headsets
entries.description: Meta wants virtual reality devices to be safe against cyberattacks and security flaws -- that's why it's inviting hackers to get hands-on with VR headsets and more.

entries.title: Snap up a Samsung Odyssey gaming monitor for less than $150
entries.description: A discount of 40% is on offer through the Samsung outlet.

entries.title: CES 2023: Samsung Display to show off display that folds and slides
entries.description: Samsung Display's Flex Hybrid combines its foldable and slidable technologies and is aimed at future laptops.
